meanings.definition: Engaged in casual or idle talk about others.
meanings.sent1: The gossiped story was about a friendly cat in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She felt hurt by the gossiped comments made behind her back.
meanings.sent3: The gossiped tale of the talking parrot amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The gossiped news spread like wildfire through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The gossiped secret was finally revealed at the school assembly.

meanings.definition: Spread rumors or talk about the private affairs of others.
meanings.sent1: She gossiped with her friends about the new student in class.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors gossiped about the mysterious man who moved in next door.
meanings.sent3: The parrot gossiped about the squirrel stealing nuts from the garden.
meanings.sent4: The wind gossiped through the trees, carrying whispers of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The waves gossiped as they crashed against the shore, sharing tales of the sea.
